text.author: Giuliana Calascibetta
text.title: just a lowkey saturday | is this a vlog? | giuliana
text.summary: Giuliana shows a low-key Saturday in her vlog, in which she invites her grandmother Nonna Lina and her grandmother’s friend Mrs. Pellegrino to the pizza shop where she works to teach them how to make pizzas along with the help of her co-worker.
